instructions.para: Enter the instructions for ordering. If the item cannot be ordered, state that it cannot be ordered.

customization.para: Enter the instructions for ordering.

admin.para: The text for this field will be unique to each project, and should be created by the project manager for any given project.
Ordering may be possible in the future; if that happens, the information in the "Ordering Information" field should change appropriately.

history.justification: Special Collections wanted all items to have ordering instructions.

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation.
removed cdm compound object ITEM descriptions after MIG decided they're not wanted
Add custom instructions and examples for Sephardic Studies Digital Collection - p16786coll3.
Add guidance and examples for Tacoma Japanese Language School Project - temp_alias_001
